text: Yongning Subdistrict () is a subdistrict under the administration of Wenjiang District, Chengdu, Sichuan, China. Yongning administers 5 residential communities () and 105 administrative neighborhoods (). The subdistrict spans an area of 23.5 square kilometers, and has a registered population of approximately 24,000. Located in the northeast of Wenjiang District, the subdistrict lies approximately 10 kilometers away from the city centre of Chengdu. == References == Category:Township-level divisions of Sichuan Category:Chengdu
title: Yongning Subdistrict, Wenjiang District
